title: About cube recipes
text: - Below cube recipes are specific to Sanctuary of Exile
- All cube recipes from vanilla Project Diablo 2 work unless stated otherwise on this page
- Please refer to [Vanilla PD2 Wiki](https://wiki.projectdiablo2.com/wiki/Main_Page) for vanilla cube recipes

title: Hellfire torch desecration
text: - Lucion has 5% chance to drop `Desecration Orb`
- Desecration Orb can be used to desecrate your [Hellfire Torch](app:uniques:Hellfire Torch)
- There is 45% chance that your [Hellfire Torch](app:uniques:Hellfire Torch) will be destroyed to Hellfire Ashes
- All modifiers have equal weighting
- Demonic Cube can be used to remove the desecration status
- Possible mods:
- +1 to All Skills
- +10% Faster Cast Rate
- +10% Faster Run/Walk
- +10% Curse Resistance
- +[30-40]% Enhanced Damage
- Cannot Be Frozen
- +2% to ALL Maximum Resistances
- All Resistances +[7-10]
- Poison Length Reduced by 50%

title: Outer Void map recipes
text: - [Outer Void](app:uniques:Outer Void) is the only unique map that can be crafted with map currency
- This map can have two Terrors applied to it
- This map can have five Glyphs applied to it
- This map can have three chisels applied to it
- This map gets monster % HP and % physical damage bonus as it was T4 Dungeon
- Please mind that applying two times the same Terror does not work and may bug the map!

title: Map currency recipes
text: - Rare T4 dungeons can be now re-rolled with Infused Horadrim Orb
- Cube a rare map with glyph to add bonus modifier - check [Glyphs](app:changes:glyphs) for more information
- Cube a rare map with terror to add bonus modifier - check [Terrors](app:changes:terrors) for more information

title: Mythic Orb recipes
text: - `White/Superior/Magic/Rare normal/exceptional tier item` + `Mythic Orb` = `Unique item on that base`
- `Magic Grand Charm` + `Mythic Orb` = `Gheed's Fortune`
- Result item will always be non-ethereal, even if the input item was ethereal
- Rings and amulets honor the rarity of the resulting unique item (please refer to `Occurence Chance` in `Uniques` tab)
- Rings can result in: Nagelring, Manald Heal, Raven Frost, Dwarf Star, Carrion Wind
- Amulets can result in: Nokozan Relic, The Cat's Eye, The Mahim Oak Curio, Saracen's Chance, Crescent Moon, The Eye of Etlich, Atma's Scarab

title: Divine Orb recipes
text: - `White/Superior/Magic/Rare elite tier item` + `Divine Orb` = `Unique item on that base`
- `5x Jewel Fragment` + `Divine Orb` = `Random unique regular jewel`
- `Magic/Rare Mythical Jewel` + `Divine Orb` = `Random unique mythical jewel`
- `Magic Ornate Charm` + `3x Divine Orb` = `Random unique ornate charm`
- Result item will always be non-ethereal, even if the input item was ethereal
- Rings and amulets honor the rarity of the resulting unique item (please refer to `Occurence Chance` in `Uniques` tab)
- Rings can result in: The Stone of Jordan, Bul Katho's Wedding Band, Nature's Peace, Constricting Loop, Wisp Projector, Deaths Poise
- Amulets can result in: The Rising Sun, Highlord's Wrath, Mara's Kaleidoscope, Seraph's Hymn, Metalgrid, Defiance of Destiny, Astramentis
- You can now create Armageddon Blade in Cube - the recipe is `Phase Blade` + `5x Divine Orb` = `Armageddon Blade`

title: Exalted Orb recipes
text: - `White/Superior/Magic/Rare of any tier item` + `Exalted Orb` = `Set item on that base`
- Result item will always be non-ethereal, even if the input item was ethereal
- Rings and amulets honor the rarity of the resulting set item (please refer to `Occurence Chance` in `Set` tab)

title: Infernal Crucible recipes
text: - Infernal Crucible gives three random stacks of three uber materials after cubing twice
- Infernal Crucible can be influenced to give certain material
- Example: If you would like to receive more Splinter of the Void, then use the recipe `Infernal Crucible` + `Splinter of The Void` = `Influenced Infernal Crucible`
- In the above example, one `Splinter of the Void` will be consumed, but you will receive three in return along with other uber crafting materials

title: Rune downgrading recipes
text: - Runes from Eld to Pul can be downgraded with a recipe `Rune in stacked or non-stacked form` + `Key or Skeleton Key` = `3x Lower Rune`
- Runes from Ist to Ber can be downgraded with a recipe `Rune in stacked or non-stacked form` + `Key or Skeleton Key` = `1x Lower Rune`
- Runes from Jah to Zod can be downgraded with a recipe `Rune in stacked or non-stacked form` + `1x Eternal Coin` = `1x Lower Rune`

title: Unsocketing recipes
text: - You can now remove any item socket contents while preserving said content using Larzuk's Mallus (item sold by Larzuk in any act for 250k gold)
- `Larzukâ€™s Malus` + `Socketed Item` = `Used item with socket contents removed (preserves the contents)`
- Works with all socketable items, including RUNEWORDS
- The item cannot be CORRUPTED

title: Mythical Jewel recipes
text: - `Regular/Mythic Magic jewel` + `Jeweller's Prism` = `Rare Regular/Mythic jewel`
- Magic/Rare Mythical Jewels can be re-rolled with `3x perfect gem`. Preserves the item level
- DO NOT USE PERFECT SKULL TO RE-ROLL, AS THIS WILL LOWER THE ILVL OF THE ITEM. IT IS HARDCODED BEHAVIOUR AND CANNOT BE CHANGED
- `Magic/Rare Mythical Jewel` + `Key` = `5 Jewel Fragments` - Works with up to 10 jewels at one time

title: Crafting infusions recipes
text: - Crafting infusions can now craft on already crafted bases
- Crafting infusions can now be created in the Cube
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Ruby` + `Thul Rune` = `Blood Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Amethyst` + `Ral Rune` = `Caster Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Sapphire` + `Ral Rune` = `Hitpower Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Emerald` + `Ort Rune` = `Safety Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Skull` + `Shael Rune` = `Vampiric Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Topaz` + `Hel Rune` = `Bountiful Crafting Infusion`
- `Jewel Fragment` + `Perfect Diamond` + `Dol Rune` = `Brilliant Crafting Infusion`

title: Circlet crafting recipes
text: - Circlets ([Circlet](app:armors:Circlet), [Coronet](app:armors:Coronet), [Tiara](app:armors:Tiara), [Diadem](app:armors:Diadem)) can now be crafted with crafting infusions
- Works with white and crafted bases
- Ehtereal status is preserved on craft

title: Larzuk Puzzlebox and Larzuk Puzzle piece recipes
text: - Larzuk Puzzlebox and Larzuk Puzzle piece can be used to re-roll the number of sockets
- Larzuk PuzzleBox and Larzuk Puzzle piece will now give up to maximum number of sockets on base
- Rerolling number of sockets with above will DESTROY the contents
- Larzuk Puzzlebox and Larzuk Puzzle piece can now be used on boots

title: Cain's Wisdom recipes
text: - [Cain's Wisdom](app:uniques:Cain's Wisdom) is created by cubing one of each essence of `Suffering`, `Hatred`, `Terror`, `Destruction` and a `Small Magic Charm`
- Cain's Wisdom can be cubed with [Annihilus](app:uniques:Annihilus) to fuse the two together and transfer the bonus from Cain's to Annihilus

title: Lilith's mirror recipes
text: - Lilith's Mirror can now be used in the cube with `non-corrupted unique/set armor/weapon/amulet/ring` to create exact copy of it - transfers sockets and ethereal status. Mirrored items can't be mirrored again
- Lilith's Mirror can now be used with `magic/rare/unique regular/mythic jewels` to create exact copy of it. Mirrored jewels can't be mirrored again
